Sentencas: In this paper a ceramic deposition method that does not require a high temperature sintering step is presented.
Titulo: Applications of spin coating of polymer precursor and slurry suspensions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell fabrication

Sentencas: The method is used for a fabrication of electrolyte layers for SOFCs and high temperature protective coatings of stainless steel.
Titulo: Applications of spin coating of polymer precursor and slurry suspensions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell fabrication

Sentencas: The preparation of polymeric precursors and ceramic slurries are described and structure evolution of the deposited layers during heat treatment is discussed.
Titulo: Applications of spin coating of polymer precursor and slurry suspensions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell fabrication

Sentencas: Application of described method might help in eliminating problems related to excessive steel corrosion of metal supported SOFCs or reaction between electrolyte and cathode during high temperature sintering process.
Titulo: Applications of spin coating of polymer precursor and slurry suspensions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell fabrication
